docs.snippet: Mr. Trump and the Indiana governor differ on some issues and are dissimilar religiously and temperamentally, creating a challenge for Mr. Pence to conform....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump and the Indiana governor differ on some issues and are dissimilar religiously and temperamentally, creating a challenge for Mr. Pence to conform.
docs.abstract: News Analysis; Donald Trump's pick of Indiana Gov Mike Pence as his running mate has brought about one of most sharply dissimilar presidential tickets in modern political history.

headline.main: Donald Trump and Mike Pence, Republicans as Different as Night and Day

docs.snippet: Donald Trump presented running mate Mike Pence to the nation Saturday, hailing the Indiana governor as his "first choice" and "my partner in the campaign." But he left no doubt in a sometimes awkward event that Pence's role will surely be as sidek...
docs.lead_paragraph: Donald Trump presented running mate Mike Pence to the nation Saturday, hailing the Indiana governor as his "first choice" and "my partner in the campaign." But he left no doubt in a sometimes awkward event that Pence's role will surely be as sidekick to the businessman-turned-reality-star-turned-politician at the top of the ticket.

headline.main: Trump Presents 'Partner' Pence, but No Doubt Who's the Star
headline.print_headline: Trump Presents 'Partner' Pence, but No Doubt Who's the Star
